name: Subway Simulator Metro Station
description:
You have a chance to explore the mystical world of subway from within!
Everyone uses subway – every day or once in a month, it doesn’t matter. Have you ever thought, what it feels like – to work as a metropolitan train driver? Have you ever thought, what hides in tunnels? Now you have a chance to explore underground from the driver’s cabin! Subway Simulator Metro Station – you were hired as an underground train driver, so try your best!
HOW TO PLAY: Drive the train and carry passengers. Stop at every station, open and close doors. Control your train’s speed, be careful and accurate.
Subway Simulator Metro Station GAME FEATURES:
Real subway simulator;
Help passengers reach the station they need;
Explore underground from within;
Train driving simulator;
Realistic physics;
Cool graphics and sounds effects.
Subway Simulator Metro Station – are you ready to start your career? Stand clear of the doors, please!
